blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: Years apart
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2zHVttR

by ArabellaMalfoy

Sirius Black has finally been released from Azkaban under false charges, his boyfriend Remus Lupin thought he had done the crime he was imprisoned for. Will their love for each other overrule the mistake he made?

Words: 339, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, Sirius Black
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin

blog.name: my-fandom-imagine
blog.title: My Fandom Imagines
blog.description: Sometimes ideas just come to my mind and I write them down in my notes, unfortunately my ideas have become one to many so I have decided to post them as imagines on here. Feel free to mention any Fandoms you would like to see on my blog.

body: Imagine spending Christmas at Grimmauld Place with the rest of the order and getting caught under mistletoe with Sirius, who you’ve liked for quite a while.

blog.name: teenfreaker
blog.title: teenfreaker
blog.description:
Animal and human rights activist, fanfiction writer, fangirl and mom

Instagram: melinafreyaolsen

body:
Fanfiction

So a while back, I contemplated writing and uploading fanfiction. This is something I have now decided to do.

It won’t be right away, as I am currently preparing for the arrival of me and my mans first child, who should be arriving around mid December.

I will however, be posting small fanfics, or small writings from some of my favorite fandoms - this would most likely be Harry Potter, Hawaii Five-0, and anything related to Lord of The Rings, as these are the fandoms I am most into at the moment. Other fandoms will follow at a later date.

I don’t know when I’ll be posting the first one, but I should have it out before the end of November, maybe around Black Friday (hallelujah!)

blog.name: etspeaksfromhome
blog.title: ET Speaks From Home
blog.description: Write about ET (Eileen Teo and not Extra-Terrestrial) as a mother of two, my two beautiful kids and products/service that I review or use! Both of my children are child models, working with Alan Sharman Agency (Birmingham) and Source Models Agency (London). I will blog on my experiences with them too.

title: Harry Potter Pyjama Twitter Party
body:
Come & Join in Harry Potter Pyjama Twitter Party on Monday 12 Nov 2018 8pm #HarryPotterPJParty

You are all invited to the Harry Potter Pyjama Twitter Party which will be on tomorrow Monday 12th November from 8 to 9 pm! So remember to save the date and make yourself available!

I will be taking part in this Twitter party along with other fellow influencers to join in the fun and to share our thoughts about this new range of Harry Potter pyjamas from New Look.

blog.name: hpfanficscout
blog.title: A Passion for Harry Potter Fanfics
blog.description: Harry Potter fanfiction recommendations and responses to search requests. (active blog: drwannable) Also, please visit my FF.net HP Community: http://tinyurl.com/n2zzbqk

question: Serpens arcanem
answer:
Hello anon,

As I have recieved mutliple search requests for Serpens Armarum/Arcanem by Evandar, I would like to take this time to address all of you at once.

I unfortunately must tell you that both stories are no longer available on any official online platform per the author’s wishes.

I am not fluent in any language other than English, so I cannot state one way or another if there is a translated version somewhere. Regardless, those translations are not endorsed by the author, and so should not be supported anyway out of respect for Evandar.

As far as I understand it, Evandar is a different person now compared to when they began the series, and does not believe they can satisfactorily continue it to completion. Evandar has every right to make this decision, as they are the sole creator of these works and have no obligation to anyone else to choose otherwise.

Apparently, some individuals were so rude, inconsiderate and disrespectful about the hiatus/discontinuation of the series that Evandar felt compelled to take the fics off of the internet altogether and may even have negative associations with the series now. This is just what I have ‘heard’, so please don’t quote me on this. But if this is true, I find it sad and disappointing that Evandar was essentially bullied and harassed so much that things ended up this way.

Please be respectful to fanfiction authors and be appreciative of the works they share with us, even if they aren’t complete or available forever.

I do acknowledge that I posted a recommendation for this series way back when, and I will take it down if it gives readers false hope of finding it. I apologize if I misled any of you in this way.

I hope you find other reading that suits your interests, anon, or will contact me again if you have another request.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary:
—In a haunted house—
Hufflepuff: Sly, I’m scared...

Hufflepuff:

body:
—In a haunted house—


Hufflepuff: Sly, I’m scared…

Slytherin: Don’t worry, Puff. I’ll hold your hand.

Hufflepuff:

Slytherin: Yes?

Hufflepuff: That’s my ass.

Slytherin: Yes.

tags: fantastic beats and where to find them

summary: Like, a lot of things about HP bug me, but the one picking the most at my brain lately is the fact that so many characters will...
body: Like, a lot of things about HP bug me, but the one picking the most at my brain lately is the fact that so many characters will claim that Quidditch is hard to explain / the rules are complicated… and then it turns out to be the simplest fucking thing with the simplest fucking rules and not fucking hard to explain at all.

reblog.comment: Like, a lot of things about HP bug me, but the one picking the most at my brain lately is the fact that so many characters will claim that Quidditch is hard to explain / the rules are complicated… and then it turns out to be the simplest fucking thing with the simplest fucking rules and not fucking hard to explain at all.

trail.content_raw: Like, a lot of things about HP bug me, but the one picking the most at my brain lately is the fact that so many characters will claim that Quidditch is hard to explain / the rules are complicated… and then it turns out to be the simplest fucking thing with the simplest fucking rules and not fucking hard to explain at all.
trail.content: Like, a lot of things about HP bug me, but the one picking the most at my brain lately is the fact that so many characters will claim that Quidditch is hard to explain / the rules are complicated… and then it turns out to be the simplest fucking thing with the simplest fucking rules and not fucking hard to explain at all.

tags: you should be used to this shit by now
summary: Ron uses the floo to visit Hermione at her parents' house and suddenly the Mrs Granger is faced with a sooty redhead in the...
title: Ron uses the floo to visit Hermione at her parents' house and suddenly the Mrs Granger is faced with a sooty redhead in the middle of the living room
body:
Ron: *spluttering* aRGH! OW! WHAT THE BLOODY FUCK
Mrs Granger: i'm sorry! i- wait why am i apologising, how the fuck did you get into my house?!
Ron: WHY THE FU- IT FUCKING BURNS
Ron: WHY DID YOU THINK CHUCKING HOT TEA AT ME WAS A GOOD IDEA?!
Mrs Granger: I FUCKING PANICKED, OK, I STUDIED DENTISTRY AT UNI, NOT HOW TO REACT WHEN A DEMON BURSTS OUT OF MY FIREPLACE
Ron: I'M NOT A DEMON
Hermione: *coming downstairs* hey, mum, what's all the yelling-
Hermione: 
Hermione: ron?
Hermione: mum, why is my boyfriend completely wet?
Ron: she threw her tea at me!
Hermione: ...mum, why
Mrs Granger: ...i thought he was a demon
Hermione: 
Hermione: you've literally met him before
Mrs Granger: *anxiously wringing a dishcloth* well, what was i supposed to think? he came out of the fireplace, with his red hair and everything...
Hermione: *disbelieving*
Mrs Granger: i said i was sorry!
Hermione: i'm going back upstairs.
Ron: i'm still wet
Hermione: oh quit whining, ronald, use your bloody wand.

body:
Homework: write a comparative essay on libraries and the Internet as the major sourc-
My mind: Lily, take Harry and go! It's him! Go! Run! I'll hold him off...
Me *sobbing*: they deserved to live a long, happy life why was it like that.....Or Lily could have run away with Harry....please whyyyyyy....MY HEART

blog.name: taliesin-19
blog.title: Taliesin19
blog.description: Writer and reader of Harry Potter fanfiction. My main story right now is Grow Young with Me. Feel free to leave any questions or comments you may have or just scroll through all the random stuff I reblog :)

body:
Random Fact of the Week #30

One of the perks of working at the Ministry was that Harry, Ron, and Hermione were always able to eat lunch together, with the occasional appearance from Arthur or–Merlin forbid–Percy. (The latter sentiment being mostly expressed by Ron).

Of course, this arrangement did cause many intrigued stares, at first. Most people seemed to be under the impression that very important information was being shared amongst the three of them. They were war heroes, after all. Saviours of the Wizarding World. Leaders of a new era of government.

In reality, however, most of their overheard conversations would usually go something like this:

“Teddy finally turned his hair green yesterday,” said Harry through a mouthful of yoghurt.

“Brilliant!”

“That has been a tougher colour for him, hasn’t it?” Hermione said with interest. “I’d be really curious to know why.”

“Secondary colour, isn’t it?” Ron said.

“Yeah, but so are purple and orange,” Harry pointed out. “And he can do those just fine.”

“How about black?” Ron said. “That’s all the colours combined.”

“Not exactly,” Hermione said. “Black is actually the absence of colour. But you can, of course, make it through a mixture of other colours.”

“He can definitely do black,” Harry said before Ron could argue with her. “Copies me all the time, doesn’t he?”

“Dunno why when he can go ginger,” Ron said with a smug grin.

“Well, he does have a sense of self-preservation,” Harry said.

“Oi! Watch it,” Ron said as Hermione giggled beside him. “Can’t go saying things like that when you’re dating one.”

“Ron,” Harry said, giving him a sympathetic look, “for the last time, mate, you and I aren’t dating.”

This was unfortunately said just as Gerald Boggs, Head of the Pest Advisory Bureau and close colleague to Hermione walked past them. But Hermione only giggled harder despite the stubborn hand over her mouth.

And so, within a fairly short time, the mystery, awe, and intrigue that had initially shrouded the trio seemed to fade as a result of many similar overheard conversations.

However, Harry, Ron, and Hermione remained very highly respected amongst their older colleagues even at such a young age.

But there was no doubt in anyone’s mind that they were just that.

Young.
